data.actual_result: For a specific position it can go partially off-screen.
data.expected_result: Game pop-up shouldn't go off-screen and always shown completely
data.short_description: Game pop-ups can go off-screen for the Games tab
data.steps_to_repro: - Click on Home - Open the Games tab - Click on any game there that could go off-screen - Try it with different positions, screen sizes, zoom levels, etc.
